Translations.Text: And the dead earth is a sign for them, We bring it back to life and We bring grain out of it and they eat from it
And We made gardens of palms and grapes in it, and We made the springs flow out of it
So that they eat from its produce and what their hands made it. So will they not be thankful
Glory to the One (who is flawless and) who created the types (or the pairs), all of them, of what the earth grows and of themselves and of what they do not know
And the night is a sign for them, We strip off the daylight from it, and then they are in darkness
And the sun circulates in a place for it (in its orbit). That is determination of the powerful and the knowledgeable
And the moon, We determined phases for it until it returns like the old (dried out) date branch
It is not appropriate (or required) of the sun to catch up with the moon, and not the night to get ahead of the day, and each flow in an orbit
And a sign for them is that We carried their descendants in the loaded ship
and We created the like of it for them that they ride
And if We want We drown them, then they have no one to cry out to, and they would not be saved
except by a mercy from Us, and as an enjoyment for a while
And when it is said to them: be cautious of what is in front of you and what is behind you so you may receive mercy (they donâ€™t pay attention)
And no sign of their Master's sign came to them, unless they were turning away from it

And when it is said to them: spend (in God's way) from what God provided you. Those who disbelieved say to those who believed: should we feed someone that if God wants He would feed him? You are only in an obvious error
And they say: when is this promise if you are truthful
They only await a single awesome roar which takes them while they dispute
They cannot make any recommendation (or instruction) and they do not return to their families
